features: NOURISHING MOISTURE Shampoo and conditioner deliver soothing moisture and gently cleanse dry or damaged hair​ without stripping nutrients
SOOTHING HYDRATION Nutrient blend with rose extract SLS Free Shampoo transforms hair into petal-soft locks
HAIR-LOVING INGREDIENTS Contains pro-vitamins B5 and B3, antioxidants, and rose water; sulfate free, paraben free, silicone free, without dyes or mineral oil ​
SULFATE-FREE LUXURY HAIR REPAIR, without the $50 price tag
HYDRATING SCENTED SHAMPOO AND CONDITIONER SET Set includes one 17.9 oz bottle of shampoo and one 17.9 oz bottle of conditioner
body.description: The Pantene Pro-V Blends Collection has been developed to bring out the best of your hair, with nutrient-rich ingredients free from fillers, parabens, dyes, and mineral oil. Treat yourself to petal-soft hair every day. Pantene Pro-V Blends rose water women's sulfate free shampoo gently cleans and invigorates dry hair without stripping nutrients. Suitable for daily use, it helps transform, soothe, and moisturize dry or damaged hair. The nutrient-infused rose shampoo and rose conditioner combine a blend of pro-vitamins B5 and B3, antioxidants, and rose water extract that hydrates and will leave your hair feeling fresh. Made with a relaxing scent of rose water, mint, and lily of the valley. To use, simply wet hair, bring shampoo to a rich lather, and enjoy the relaxing rose scented fragrance. We strive to bring you innovative formulas using proven ingredients, so that every product we make helps you face the world with confidence. Transform the hair you have to the hair you want for more great hair days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pantene, Shampoo and Sulfate Free Conditioner Kit Treat yourself to roses every day! Pantene Pro-V Blends Rose Water Sulfate Free Shampoo helps soothe and moisturize hair to give you the ultimate look-moisturized, petal soft hair. This soothing shampoo's nutrient-infused formula combines a Pro-V blend of pro vitamin B5, antioxidants and rose extract to help gently cleanse and invigorate dry hair without stripping it. Our gentle formula contains no sulfates, silicones, parabens, dyes or mineral oil, and will leave your hair feeling fresh with the naturally luscious scent of rose water, mint leaves and lily of the valley. View every day through rose-colored glasses. Pantene Pro-V Blends Rose Water Sulfate Free Conditioner helps soothe and rehydrate hair so you can look your best with moisturized, petal soft hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on my fine, oily hair! Also, amazing scent!
reviews.reviewText: I have fine hair and an oily scalp that I wash everyday because I live in Miami and with how hot and humid it is here, you have to wash your hair everyday if you go outside. Plus, I workout. I bought this because I felt my hair becoming too dry from using mainly volumizing hair products and only giving super light hydration.The shampoo and conditioner are very light. The shampoo has a feeling that's similar to those strong shampoos that remove buildup. But its light enough to not strip your hair and strong enough to remove oil and sweat from my hair although, my hair feels a bit tacky after rinsing it off. The conditioner fells light too, but its definitely moisturizing and leaves my hair feeling soft and nice. Both the shampoo and conditioner leave my hair feeling softer than it was before using it.And my hair looks great after dried up too. Soft to the touch and smelling strongly of that delicious rose scent. The fragrance is very strong so if you're not into fragrance, I suggest looking for another product. But who doesn't wanna smell like a bouquet of roses everyday?Overall, this was a good buy. My hair feels healthier and while I had to get used to that tacky feeling the shampoo gives my hair, it doesn't affect my hair that feeling. In fact, my hair looks great! If you need a shampoo and conditioner that moisturizes great without the heaviness, I suggest buying this. I don't think you'll regret it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love what it does for my hair!
reviews.reviewText: The scent smells so clean! I wanted a shampoo that worked without sulfate & other ingredients I don't like to put on my head/hair. This is a very good shampoo that lathers up & cleans very well. The conditioner makes hair easy to comb through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is perfect and SMELLS SO GREATI use it as body wash and hand soap and MY HAIR LOOKS GREAT!!CLEAN AND FRESH LIKE A ROSE PEDAL!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Trying to transition to sulfate free shampoo and conditioner, and these seem to leave my hair still looking kind of greasy but I’m hoping it’s temporary as I adjust. The scent is very nice I’ll say that, and I’m researching how to make sulfate free shampoos better after using the “regular” ones for so long, so it’s a bit of a learning curve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve recently been more concerned about the ingredients in my personal hygiene items so researched new shampoo and conditioner. This product exceeded my expectations for a sulfate and parabin free switch. The scent is not overpowering and pleasant. The lather is rich and my hair doesn’t feel weighed down. I have been getting compliments on how healthy my hair looks and feels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo & conditioner set smells heavenly, leaves hair soft & silky & has a pump for easy access

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice shampoo but greasy conditioner
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo has pleasing scent but the conditioner leaves a film on my baby fine hair. Will not purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle Cleansing and Lovely, Light Scent
reviews.reviewText: My only regret is not trying this shampoo and conditioner sooner!I have baby-fine hair and it's always a challenge to find a product that isn't too harsh. At the same time, I need a product that throughly cleans and conditions. Pantene makes this line that works perfectly for my hair type. Best of all, it has a lovely, light scent that isn't too perfumey.
Me encanta el olor y como deja muy suave mi cabello, lástima que es raro que lo pongan en venta así que a cada rato ingreso para ver si ya lo pusieron y poder comprarlo.
Really like this product. Love the smell and leaves my hair soft and manageable.
